name: European Coalition on Homeopathic and Anthroposophic Medicinal Products
membership: ECHAMP has about 50 company members from 18 EU Member States active in the production and distribution of these products (Full Members), 10 Associated Members (national manufacturers’ associations) and 14 Corresponding Members (practitioners’ and patients’ organisations).
goal:
Mission: To enable our members to meet the demand from users and prescribers across the EU for homeopathic and anthroposophic medicinal products.

Goals
1. Help to develop the industry sector and the market (demand for self-medication and prescription medicines).
2. Advocate and support standards and requirements, including effectiveness, that are in line with the tradition and the therapeutic systems of homeopathy and anthroposophic medicine as practised in Europe.
3. Advocate an appropriate and well-balanced EU regulatory environment that reflects and ensures the specific quality and the high safety of these products.
4. Establish the industry as a credible and reliable health player in order to maximise political impact at EU level.
5. Build and sustain a viable, effective, value-driven and collaborative professional association that both serves the common needs of its members and reflects the broad needs of the sector.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Enlargement, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
